settings.title: HOW CAN I CHECK THE STATUS OF MY ORDER?
settings.answer:
You will receive a confirmation email once your order has been placed.
We’ll send you a second email with the tracking information once your order has been shipped.

If you have any further questions regarding your order, kindly contact us via our Contact Form or at ask@melumé-shop and we will endeavor to be in touch within 72 hours.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.content:
Drop us an email at ask@melumé-shop to leave feedback, ask questions about your order, our
products, our website, or just melumé skinscience in general. We believe regularly touching base
with our allies will help us serve you and your skin better, so feedback is always appreciated!
